title: the beta lancher is messing up
body: so when i got into the launcher there was an error, now ive downloaded it multiple times even the alpha browser ive had to redownload and it for some reason isn't picking some logs after i use the repair tool

replies.body: I'm not sure I'm really understanding what's going on.  What is the error saying when you launch the patcher?  Is this on the legacy or updated client?  If I can get some more specifics, I'd be happy to help!
it says league of legends has encountered a problem please re install the alpha client, and i do then i try to upgrade and it happens again

Does this error appear as soon as you open the patcher?  Do you get any error messages on the legacy client?

-  On the login screen of the open beta updated client, look for the "Launch Legacy Client" text at the bottom.
-  Or create a shortcut directly to the legacy client in your League Installation. Just look for "lol.launcher" 

If you do receive any errors there let me know as it might provide some more specifics on what's going on, if a reinstall didn't fix this.  Let me know!
i only get an error message when i try and launch it and it try's updating, but idk yet i havent tried what u told me to do
its not even letting me get that far with it
i think i told u the wrong lancher xD, i ment the newer one

ok i promise im not trolling you, what happens is when i hit upgrade now i hit the launch button it comes up with that error, i have had an error at the store but it was easily fixed when i reloaded the store
